full_summary:
====================
## Tender for Lumber, Building Materials and Hardware

### Notice Details

* **Title (English)**: 5P432-240026 Lumber, Building Materials and Hardware
* **Title (French)**: 5P432-240026 Bois d'œuvre, Matériaux de construction et Quincaillerie
* **Reference Number**: WS4700935392

### Tender Information

* **Publication Date**: July 26, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 9, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: July 26, 2024
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open Bidding)
* **Trade Agreements**: Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC) (Canadian Free Trade Agreement)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Colombie-Britannique (British Columbia)

### Contract Information

* **Procurement Category**: GD
* **Notice Type**: Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
* **Selection Criteria**: Prix le plus bas (Lowest Price)
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5

### Tender Description

Parks Canada has a requirement for Lumber, Building Materials and Hardware to reconstruct a staircase for emergency egress requirements and a new ticket booth structure and video viewing building at Dredge #4 National Historic Site in Yukon. The supplier must supply, deliver, and unload the requirements to Parks Canada’s Maintenance Compound located in Dawson City, Yukon.

### Contact Information

You can obtain the RFx documents through the notice URL below. Please contact the contracting authority for all inquiries. 

URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20449234?extsite=MjA0NDkyMzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please do not hesitate to contact us at Address not available by phone.
